bridgeTransferFrom(address,address,addre.details: Callback for `IERC20Bridge`. Tries to buy `makerAssetAmount` of      `makerToken` by selling the entirety of the `takerToken`      encoded in the bridge data.

params.bridgeData: ABI-encoded addresses of the taker token and        recurring buyer for whom the bridge order was created.
params.makerToken: The token to buy and transfer to `to`.
params.taker: The recipient of the bought tokens.

bridgeTransferFrom(address,address,addre.return: success The magic bytes if successful.

isValidSignature(bytes32,bytes).details: `SignatureType.Wallet` callback, so that this bridge can be the maker      and sign for itself in orders. Always succeeds.
